HediffDef.label: inefficient midgut
HediffDef.description: This person has a very inefficient acid in their midgut, making it harder to absorb nutrients. They will become hungry significantly faster, but they will be able to consume more.

HediffDef.label: dormant
HediffDef.description: This person has reduced activity and aggression and spend most of their time in a dormant state. Metabolism of such an individual is also reduced, allowing them to consume less nutrition to keep themselves alive.
